Title: Relates to incorporating the cost of living adjustment into subsequent maximum state aid rates for providing care to foster children
Summary: Relates to incorporating the cost of living adjustment into subsequent annual maximum state aid base rates for providing care to foster children.
LawCode: Amd ยง398-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to incorporating the cost of living adjustment into subsequent maximum state aid rates
